text: wlma ja'at almalayikat lwtana sa'h dhlk; li'anah znhm dywfana min albshr, whzn bsbb wjwdhm; laealimah khabuth faeal qwmh, waqaluu lh: la takhaf ealayna ln yasil 'iilayna qwmk, wala tahzan mimaa akhbrnak min 'ana mhlkwhm, 'inna mnjjuk min aleadhab alnazl bqwmk wmnjju 'ahlak maeak 'iilaa amratk, fa'iinaha halikat fymn yuhlak min qwmha
